DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , randomize ( 2:1 ) , active control , single blind , parallel two-arm , multi-center clinical investigation use Abbott Vascular ABSORB Everolimus Eluting Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold System ( ABSORB BVS ) ; compare Abbott Vascular XIENCE Everolimus Eluting Coronary Stent System ( XIENCE )
DOC.detailed_description: In USA , ABSORB BVS currently development Abbott Vascular . Not available sale US .
